name: Hayfever
description: HAYFEVER is unlike any other token. Here to develop a P2E informational DEX for the crypto-gaming community. One hub to support, advertise, and promote P2E gaming tokens. Our platform is being built and will be composed of 4 major sections: TRENDING/POPULARITY GAMEPLAY REVIEW/RATINGS EARN RATIO PER GAME ADVERTISING & PROMOTION Our platform will offer advertising opportunities for Tokens to market their games. Including trending services. We will have a special weekly spotlight to showcase new games. A user-voted “pick of the week” will be chosen as well. We want to promote the tokens & games that a community is behind. This isn’t a “promote anyone who sends in a payment” type of platform. Quality over quantity is important to us. Safety to potential investors is important to us. At the end of the day, it’s all for the greater good of the MetaVerse gaming community.
